query: SELECT id, studentId, senderType, SUBSTRING(message, 1, 50) as msg, source, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%H:%i:%s') as hora FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = 1 AND source = 'internal' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3TwTEpp3aQwpk4j.26ab54900c35 --database SFH8sqABSCK5KntMvXXcPM --execute SELECT id, studentId, senderType, SUBSTRING(message, 1, 50) as msg, source, DATE_FORMAT(createdAt, '%H:%i:%s') as hora FROM chat_messages WHERE studentId = 1 AND source = 'internal' ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;
